name: Concert Capture
description: Concert Capture provides users with tools to organize and monitor concert attendance, generates relevant statistics, and integrates with Spotify to offer enhanced music data

name: Multicolor - Discord Bot
description: From playing music to doing moderation and securing servers, this bot can do many useful and fun things

name: Password Checker
description: The password strength verification tool allows users to assess the security of their generated passwords, thereby ensuring robust protection

name: Password Generator
description: The Password Generator extension enables users to safeguard their data with a robust, securely generated password

name: Linux System Updater
description: The Linux System Updater (LSU) provides a user-friendly graphical interface for updating Debian-based systems, offering functionality comparable to Windows Update
